Binary: libtachyon-serial-0, libtachyon-serial-0-dev, libtachyon-mt-0, libtachyon-mt-0-dev, libtachyon-openmpi-0, libtachyon-openmpi-0-dev, libtachyon-mpich-0, libtachyon-mpich-0-dev, libtachyon-dev-common, libtachyon-mpi-dev, tachyon, tachyon-bin-nox, tachyon-bin-ogl, tachyon-doc
Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 12), autoconf-archive, gnulib, libtool, pkg-config, help2man, mpi-default-dev (>= 1.6), libopenmpi-dev, libmpich-dev, libjpeg-dev, libpng-dev, libgl1-mesa-dev | libgl-dev
Build-Depends-Indep: texlive-latex-base, texlive-latex-recommended, texlive-latex-extra, texlive-science, texlive-humanities, latex2html, rdfind, symlinks
Package-List: libtachyon-dev-common deb libdevel optional arch=all libtachyon-mpi-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libtachyon-mpich-0 deb libs optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libtachyon-mpich-0-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libtachyon-mt-0 deb libs optional arch=any libtachyon-mt-0-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libtachyon-openmpi-0 deb libs optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libtachyon-openmpi-0-dev deb libdevel optional arch=alpha,amd64,arm64,armel,armhf,hppa,hurd-i386,i386,ia64,kfreebsd-amd64,kfreebsd-i386,m68k,mips,mips64el,mipsel,powerpc,powerpcspe,ppc64,ppc64el,riscv64,s390x,sh4,sparc64,x32 libtachyon-serial-0 deb libs optional arch=any libtachyon-serial-0-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any tachyon deb math optional arch=all tachyon-bin-nox deb math optional arch=any tachyon-bin-ogl deb math optional arch=any tachyon-doc deb doc optional arch=all
